about.description: I am a passionate and dedicated Software Development Engineer with extensive experience in full-stack web development. My expertise spans across modern frontend frameworks like React.js and Next.js, as well as robust backend technologies including Node.js and Express.js. I thrive on creating elegant, user-centric solutions that solve real-world problems. With a strong foundation in computer science and a proven track record at Fusion Infotech Ltd., I continuously strive to push the boundaries of what's possible in web development. My journey from an intern to a Software Development Engineer has equipped me with both technical prowess and the ability to collaborate effectively in dynamic team environments.
